Your mission is to find the God Summoning Stones and summon the gods as quickly as possible.

(Actually, that's the imaginary intro for "Gacha ~God Chance~," a fictional social-networking game.)

This board game recreates the excitement of drawing a large number of gachas through purchases and in-game events. There's even the dreaded fear of duplicates! Work your real-life job to save money, but you also need to progress through the game's quest to receive draw bonuses. You can even defeat the raid boss for a sudden upset.

Play hard, get lucky, and collect those Ultra Rare characters!

—description from the publisher (adapted and transated)
publishers: Yanekan's Board Game Studio (ヤネカンのボードゲーム工房)

name: Pirate Clash
description:
In Pirate Clash you will have to be ther faster pirate, avoid the sneaky parrot from giving you away and get the three different treasures from the pirate loot before the rest.

Pirate Clash is a game that combines speed with observation. You must be the first to get the treasure, but if you make a mistake, the crew will punish you.

Each player has a stack of cards and reveals one per turn. When a character and loot match occurs, the first person to grab the golden barrel in the center of the table will win the indicated treasure.

But be careful, if the character already has the loot he was looking for or the sneaky parrot is nearby, we will not be able to get the loot.

name: Rêvelune: Barbe Verte Carte Objectif Bonus
description:
New Objective Card for the game.

Shuffle the card with the other objective cards during set up.

New objective: Stop Green Beard's pirate fleat before she rampages the cities of Celestia.

Card found in Plato Magazine 164.
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Pirates, Travel
mechanics: Communication Limits, Cooperative Game, Deduction, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Role Playing, Storytelling

name: Victory Lane
description:
Victory Lane is a fast and fun Nascar game by Richard Launius. The game uses a card driven system similar to Thunder Rolls in a compact and faster package.

—description from the publisher

name: Fallout: Wasteland Warfare – Nuka-World
description:
Welcome to Nuka World, the latest Regional Ruleset for Fallout: Wasteland Warfare and the most raider’riffic book to ever hit the shelves. From the glittering lights and plastic facades of Nuka World we bring a host of new Units, Weapons, Scenarios, Rules and more to make your Wasteland experience more exciting than ever before. Pledge allegiance to one of the three gangs of Nuka World and engage in a multi-stage war for the park in an all new campaign system and remember that anything you’re strong enough to take, is yours by right!

All the key figureheads of the Disciples, Operators and The Pack are on show here, backed by their deadly entourages in brand new miniatures, alongside some of the more flamboyant personalities that you can spot around the park. Updated rules for Wasteland Warfare as a whole are introduced with Nuka World, streamlining your experience like never before. Combined with new Vault Tec approved Profiles and Force Lists (presented in the most accessible format ever!), Nuka World is your one stop shop for Cola-themed bloodbaths!

As always, the beautifully painted miniatures gallery is accompanied by painting guides, scenarios, and a brand new book style, keeping every turn of the page new and interesting. There’s never been a Wasteland Warfare book quite like this one, the same Warfare you love, but with a brand new flavour!
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Video Game Theme, Wargame
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Events, Line of Sight, Measurement Movement, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Murder Mystery: The Game – The Mad Hatter
description: Investigate 20 locations in the game, examine evidence, interview witnesses and suspects, analyze clues, and much more. When a killer called the Mad Hatter stages a crime scene using imagery from Alice in Wonderland, you will investigate the case and bring the killer to justice. Investigate the murder mystery as a special consultant for the FBI. Challenge your skills as a detective!

name: Mythlords: Classic Monsters
description: A Deck-builder/Area Control Game of epic proportions for 1-5 players. Choose your Faction, each commanded by a Classic Monster - Dracula, Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Creature from the Deep, or the Wicked Witch. Buy cards tos build your army and supply them with weapons, vehicles, creatures, and spells to conquer locations and complete missions that will give you powerful abilities, but don't leave your sanctum undefended or your opponents may take advantage. Score points by defeating opposing champions and minions, as well as taking locations and mission cards. The first Monster to 20 points. Wins.

name: Kurragömma i Safariparken
description:
Hide and Seek in the Safari Park from Tactic Games - Seek and find hidden animals in this exciting safari park game!

Are you ready for an adventure in the safari park? In Kurragömma in the safari park, your mission is to look for hidden animals together with your fellow players. The double-sided game board can be put together in different ways before each round, making each game unique and full of challenges.

Your goal is to find the animals shown on the game card and be the first player to reach them to get rewards in the form of animal figures. Be quick and find the right animal before the other players to increase your chances of winning the game.

Hide and seek in the safari park is designed for 2 to 4 players and is recommended for children aged 4 and up. With a playing time of around 15-20 minutes, it is a perfect game to play together with family and friends, especially for younger children who can have fun searching and matching the animals.

It's worth mentioning that Hide and Seek in the Safari Park was named Children's Game of the Year 2020, making it a popular choice among players and a great game to introduce to kids.

Go on an exciting safari and let the fun begin with Hide and Seek in the safari park!
mechanics: Speed Matching, Turn Order: Stat-Based, Variable Set-up

name: Lucardia
description:
Three long years have elapsed, since the valiant Heroes drove the Demon Generals and their legions from our realm. Yet, peace proved fleeting... The aftermath of turmoil has fractured many Noble houses, each vying to expand their kingdoms, forge new alliances with heroes, and unearth potent magics and ancient scrolls to fortify their ranks. As the leader of your Noble house, the weight of proving your family's conquests as legendary, falls squarely upon your shoulders.

Each player assumes the role as the head of their noble house, each vying to expand their kingdoms, forge new alliances, and unearth potent magics and ancient scrolls to fortify their ranks.

Gameplay:


Draw cards
Roll resource dice
Make Trades
Strategize
Pay resources to play different card types
Build your kingdom with a variety of cards such as Spells,


Scrolls, Terrains, Buildings and Heroes.

—description from the designer
categories: Adventure, Ancient, Card Game, City Building, Dice, Fantasy, Medieval
mechanics: Action/Event, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Dice Rolling, Drawing, End Game Bonuses, Hand Management, Victory Points as a Resource

name: The Temptation of Siren
description:
Greek mythology tells of a hero named Odysseus who used wax earplugs and a rope to survive hearing the song of the sirens without being drowned. As you sail closer to the sirens' waters with your friends, you hear singing coming from everywhere... Will you collect the most attractive singing voices without falling into temptation?

In The Temptation of Siren, players push their luck to be the first to build sets. On each turn, players may turn over as many Singing Voice cards as they like from the deck and add them to a lineup. Each card contains two sections of color, and a player's turn ends if a fourth matching section of color appears in the lineup. A player may stop at any time and take as many cards as they like from the lineup, as long as they do not have more than three matching sections of color in their area.

Players may trade in their cards for one of the three visible Singing Voice Points cards after or instead of drawing, but not before. The Singing Voice Points cards require different combinations and numbers of color sections, with more challenging combinations being worth more points. The first player to collect 15 points worth of Singing Voice Points cards wins.

—user summary (translated and adapted from the rules and publisher's description)

name: Gemma karte
description:
Gemma is a land of bright hope, where joyful hearts become gems. The joy of happiness is a white gem. The joy of peace is a blue gem. The joy of wisdom is a black gem. Emotional joy is a red gem. The kingdom brought joy to the people, and the people donated gems to the kingdom, and together they developed. Tour the royal capital, collect jewels of joy, and expand your kingdom with Gemma carte, the map to jewels. The person who contributes the most to the kingdom's prosperity will be the next heir to the throne.

Gemma karte is a game of worker placement and resource management with cute components and simple rules. Earn gems by moving pieces to locations, use the collected gems to add new locations or present them to the castle. Use your character's unique abilities to be the first to earn 5 honor points and win the game!
mechanics: Modular Board, Variable Player Powers, Worker Placement

name: Brummy
description:
Rummy-style game designed by David Parlett where players are trying to collect cards which will form a high-scoring 3x3 grid of cards. In contrast to other Rummy games, when a player knocks they instead will lay out a grid and score for 3-card combinations formed within the grid.

The name "Brummy" comes from the demonym for the city of Birmingham, England.

name: Flip 7
description:
Flip over cards one by one without flipping the same number twice.

Sound easy? Think again! This isn't just any deck of cards… In Flip 7 there's only one 1 card, two 2's, three 3’s, etc plus a bunch of special cards that can score you extra points, give you a second chance, or freeze you or your opponents in your tracks.

Are you the type of player to play it safe and bank points before you bust, or are you going to risk it all and go for the bonus points by flipping over seven in a row? Press your luck meets strategy in this addictive card game that's sure to be the greatest card game you’ve ever played!

—description from the publisher

name: Blank Slate: Challenge
description:
A game of anticipated predictions! Pick from the Word Cue Cards (150 cues in all), write the two words you think best completes the phrase – and try to match it exactly to your partner’s words without giving a single hint. How well can you put your finger on what they’re thinking?
Just grab a slate, write your words, and get ready to make a match! Who knows – if you get good enough at it, soon you might be finishing each OTHER’S ______.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Party Game, Word Game

name: Monsters on the Moon
description:
Four monsters. One moon. And they all want these crystals!

Four different monsters are travelling from earth into space to conquer the moon. Of course, none of them will let the others win!
Place your monster cards skillfully on top of and next to each other. Cover the heads of the other monsters and set up your own large colonies. Add moon walls and your space shuttles to the mix and you have the moon almost under control! But don’t forget the valuable moon crystals – they are the only way to get back to earth!

Which monster will conquer the moon?

name: Solitaire General: Napoleon at Waterloo
description:
This is a solitaire game where you step into the mind of Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte on 18 June, 1815 and take on his greatest challenge. Can you defeat the combined armies of Wellington and Blücher near the small town of Waterloo, or will you be defeated and deposed from the throne of France?

Your objective, as Napoleon, is not only to crush Wellington's hodgepodge Allied forces, but you must also retain enough of your army – especially the Guard – for the battles to come. For if Napoleon won at Waterloo, he would still have to face large Russian and Austrian armies.

Key to the game is the revealing of the Allied forces. When Napoleon arranged his forces at Waterloo most of the Allied forces were hidden behind tall crops, hedges, ridges and other terrain features. So it will be with you - as you make contact with the enemy, their forces will start to be revealed. Perhaps your attack will hit weak troops, or maybe you'll end up facing the British Guard and their fearsome heavy cavalry! Every game will be different and your decisions will determine victory or defeat. The Allies do not just sit back either: They will reinforce, launch cavalry charges and/or infantry attacks and of course the Prussians are on their way…

The destiny of France is in your hands.

Features
Napoleon at Waterloo is an area movement game of the Battle of Waterloo. Units are generally brigades, and there are over 100 of them as the game includes not just the forces that actually fought at Waterloo but also:

The entire French Armée du Nord.
The entire Prussian I, II and IV Corps.
The Allied forces (Dutch and British Divisions) in reserve at Hal.


A great many options and scenarios are included for variety, such as:

Uncertain Prussian arrival.
An early start.
Reaction of the Allied forces at Hal.
Blocking the Prussians in the forests.
Grouchy.
Different difficulty settings.


Sequence of Play

Bombardment Phase.
Roll Command Dice Phase.
Expend Command Dice Phase.
Enemy Reaction Phase.
Check for Victory/Defeat Phase.


—description from the publisher
mechanics: Different Dice Movement, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Set-up

name: Treasures Lost
description:
Navigate wisely across the uncharted lands. Choose your path and find the lost treasures!

Choose your character and embark on a solo expedition or compete against the other treasure hunters. Choose one of the uncharted locations to explore. Survey your maps and plan your route. Defeat monsters or find a way around. Collect treasures and artifacts to unlock one of the endings for your character!

—description from the designer
categories: Adventure, Exploration, Fantasy, Pirates, Print & Play
mechanics: Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Line Drawing, Roll / Spin and Move, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid

name: Dinky Dungeon
description:
You are an adventurer who came to this island under the king's orders. Unfortunately, you are a pretty lame adventurer. While in a tavern and having a hard time finding the courage to enter the dungeon, you come up with a good idea. "Let's hire other adventurers to go in my place !"

Dinky Dungeon is a simple card game where a turn consists of drawing a card and playing one of your two cards.
Use your best judgment and employ cunning tactics to outperform your opponents, conquer the dungeon, and earn its riches - but be careful! Earned rewards can be stolen by others...

name: ミタイナ (Mitaina)
description:
This is a game in which children write an answer to a made up scenario - for example "A bodybuilder who is like a time traveler". The parents read these answers and try to guess what the original prompt was.

A dry erase party game of cooperation, deduction, and ridiculous situations.

—user summary

「〇〇みたいな〇〇」というお題に対して、それが実際あったらどんな風になるのか、子プレイヤーたちが回答を答えます。 親プレイヤーは子プレイヤーの回答だけを見て、そのお題が何かを当てるゲームです。

—description from the publisher

name: エモラン (Emorank)
description:
All players write an answer based on a common theme. Afterwards, all answers are ranked based on the level of emotion they illicit amongst the players.
Try to come up with an answer that will cause the biggest stir of emotions within other players!

—user summary

「運動会で」「はずかしいこと」などのテーマに沿った答えを全員が書き、親プレイヤーはそれぞれの回答を感情の度合いで順位づけしていきます。はたして狙い通りの順位に選ばれることができるでしょうか？みんなの意外な価値観が明らかになる、盛り上がること間違いなしの新感覚パーティーゲームです！

—description from the publisher

name: Mythlords: Dark OZ Expansion
description:
Add New commanders - Dorothy Gale and the Wicked Witch as well as new champions and minions. Four new locations, missions, and weapons. Bring Oz, the Witches, the Tin Man, the Scarecrow, and the Cowardly Lion to the Classic Monster mythos.

—description from the publisher

name: 千両アクター (SENRYOU ACTOR)
description:
This is an acting game with a "forbidden word" element. Players select a setting, and are dealt character cards to act out within this setting. However, a forbidden word is chosen - if any of the players mentions this word, they lose!

Act out your given role sincerely, as players will vote on the most convincing portrayal.

—user summary

NGワードを言わないように、それぞれ割り当てられた配役を演じる即興劇ゲームです。

ゲームはシーン設定カードを1枚選び、プレイ人数に応じたアルファベットのカードをプレイヤーに配ります。その後NGワードを相手だけが見えるようにカードスタンドに立てます。

シーン設定に応じた即興劇を制限時間5分で各プレイヤーは演じます。このときNGワードを口にして指摘されると負けになります。負けたプレイヤーも含め、即興劇を演じきり最後に1番役になりきっていたプレイヤーを投票で決めます。最多投票者が複数いる場合はその全員がゲームの勝者です。

リモートでも遊べるルールが含まれており、遠くの人とも気軽に遊ぶことができます。

—description from the publisher

name: Rhyme Party
description:
You are all rappers. You have to rap according to a pre-specified theme while rhyming with the theme word drawn on the cards.
When the beat starts playing, the game starts! Who is the strongest rapper?

—user summary

みなさんはラッパーです。あらかじめ指定されたテーマに沿ってラップをして、さらにお題ワードで韻を踏まなければいけません。ビートが流れたらゲーム開始！ 最強のラッパーは誰だ！？

—description from the publisher

name: Escape Adventures XXL: Von Fabelwesen und epischen Schlachten
description: Family friendly escape game in a medieval setting. The story driven game includes solving puzzles as well as some deductive skills and offers a scoring at the end based in the age of the group and the used hints.

name: Treasure of Monkey Island
description:
Capture the treasure before the captain catches you! A pirate captain has collected quite a treasure, and these pesky monkeys want a piece of it! Move around the game board, make your way to the captain´s lair and steal as many coins as you can. Just be careful because the captain does not want to share!

Players roll dice to either move their own monkey or move the captain. If you manage to get into the captains lair you can steal gold, but must get out before the captain catches you. First player to return with 3 gold coins wins the game.
mechanics: Push Your Luck, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Steel Front: Sherman 1944
description:
Steel Front: Sherman 1944 is a solitaire wargame that puts you in control of a Sherman tank during the Battle of France in 1944. As the tank crew, you'll face off against a game-controlled German side, utilizing a mix of strategy and luck to overcome the challenges presented by the enemy and the environment.

The game features detailed photorealistic maps that vary in layout and conditions, affecting your gameplay strategy. Each mission is designed to be replayed, with changing weather conditions, different enemy setups, and dynamic objectives that ensure no two games are the same.

Steel Front: Sherman 1944 is perfect for those who enjoy solo wargames with a strong emphasis on historical accuracy and tactical depth. The campaign mode provides a series of interconnected missions that build on each other, creating a rich narrative and varied gameplay experience.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Wheel to Wheel
description:
Wheel to Wheel is a modern formula racing board game for car Racing fans and Families to enjoy the thrill of a race weekend. It simulates the excitement of real life racing. You can enjoy the excitement of risky overtakes, crashes, crucial pit stops, strategies and much more. The colorful design of the hexagonal board incorporates famous curves from racetracks around the world. The game includes premium durable metal tokens based on Enzo, our Wheel to Wheel character, and embedded wooden dice for three different engine modes. Every player has a Control Panel for setting their skills, completed laps, tire options and energy deployment. By using the energy recovery system you can optimize your speed on the track and overtake in crucial moments.

The dedicated free app makes the gameplay more exciting and helps to follow the progression of the game. It contains a calculator too for easily calculating the race results, and gives a clear overview of the rules with its built in rulebook.

No plastics used. All accessories are manufactured with premium quality made of metal or recycled wood.

—description from the designer

name: Aeon's End: The Caverns
description:
Aeon's End: The Caverns Expansion requires Aeon's End to play and is compatible with existing Aeon's End content. Includes:
2 New Mages
1 New Friend
1 New Foe
1 New Nemesis
90 New Cards
7 new supply cards
7 new treasures
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Science Fiction
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Variable Phase Order, Variable Player Powers

name: Maxonaut
description:
Maxonaut is a bluffing card game. Each player in turn plays a combination of two numbered cards face down, announcing a value. The next player must either call the previous player's bluff, or play two cards and announce a higher value. The first player to make five incorrect calls loses the game.
Optionally, some special power power cards can be added to the deck.

name: Aeon's End: Tales of Old Gravehold
description:
Requires Aeon's End to play and is compatible with existing Aeon's End content.
Includes:

1 New Mage,
2 New Player Cards
2 New Expedition Booklets to use with Original Aeon's End and Aeon's End: War Eternal
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Science Fiction
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Variable Phase Order, Variable Player Powers

name: Crime & Dine: Das Krimi-Dinner-Set – Friesenmord auf Sylt
description:
Invite your guests to an exciting dinner evening in the Frisian restaurant “Strandräuber”. But be warned: murder is on the menu today! As the players, you are the main suspects in a mysterious death: Has an old treasure hunter from Sylt really found what he was looking for? Onno Reik may have found the pirate treasure of the legendary Captain Magnus Rotbart Ahmout. He has invited people to his nephew's restaurant to announce something important to friends, acquaintances and adversaries. But before this can happen, Onno is found murdered. Was it about the treasure? Were conflicts from days gone by his undoing? Or has he not found any treasure at all, but uncovered a well-kept secret that should have remained hidden?

—description from the publisher

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Obsession/Golden Dagger Promo Cards
description:
This is a promo set consisting of the Obsession Rare Gear card and the related Golden Dagger Basic Hunt Event card. These were included with the Early Survivor: Zelda miniature, which itself is not part of the game.

Obsession (Weapon, 3/6+/3, no affinities); while you have 8 or more pieces in your gear grid that share the same keyword, this gains Deadly 3.

name: Das inoffizielle Quiz für Marvel-Fans
description:
Experience exciting adventures with your favorite superheroes from the Marvel universe, fight legendary opponents and test your knowledge of one of the most successful film franchises of all time. Are you a hardcore fan or should you watch the Marvel films again?
Use the placement test to find out which superhero is most like you! Test your knowledge with over 250 exciting questions and prove that you are a true Marvel fan. Embark on a puzzle journey through the Marvel universes alone or together with friends. The appropriately designed game templates for the joint quiz are easy to download via QR code.

—description from the publisher

name: Der Pass: Tatort – Bergsee!
description:
The disemboweled body of a German who worked for an Austrian company is floating in a mountain lake near the German border. He seemed to have made a habit of spending almost every other weekend at the lake to take a break from the big city. But perhaps this was not the only reason for his stay at the lake ...

Ellie Stocker and Gedeon Winter quickly take on the case. But the first parallels to the Krampus case soon emerge and the investigators are faced with a mystery: Why was the victim floating in the lake? What was the motive? Who is the killer? And above all - will he strike again?

—description from the publisher

name: Die Escape-Box für Minecraft-Fans: Flucht aus dem Dungeon
description:
You leave your village to travel the world in search of glory and adventure. But no sooner have you ventured a few steps into a dungeon while exploring than the entrance suddenly closes behind you. You are trapped! The guardian of the dungeon tells you that the powerful Arch-Illager is behind it. He wants to use his magic to open a portal of darkness and unleash an army of monsters on the world. You must prevent this! But you don't have much time. The portal will be open in 45 minutes and the monsters can escape unhindered! Will you manage to avert the threat and free yourselves from the dungeon?

—description from the publisher

name: Alea Aquarius: Das Quiz
description:
Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of Alea Aquarius and accompany the Alpha Cru on their exciting adventures! Test your fan knowledge with 128 tricky questions about the popular novel series and the protection of the oceans. Discover fantastic facts about the magical merpeople, Lennlea and her friends. And learn how you can protect the environment and marine animals. Are you ready for the challenge?

—description from the publisher

name: Das inoffizielle Quiz für Taylor Swift-Fans
description:
Taylor Swift is a true music legend who inspires millions of fans with her songs. But how big is your fan passion really? Do you know what Taylor's first single was? Do you know her favorite number? And can you answer what the singer wanted to be when she was five years old? Test your knowledge with 128 questions about Taylor's life, career and music and find out lots of exciting facts about the superstar!

—description from the publisher

name: Fish you were here: Das witzige Reaktionsspiel
description:
Dive into the underwater world! This fun and action-packed card game is all about sea creatures. They feel lonely and wish they could meet an animal of the same species. Most of the time they meet other animals and respond with “blubb”, but when they meet one of their own kind, they greet each other enthusiastically with their own words and gestures! “Bling” is what the frogfish shout when they swim past each other, blinking happily. But what do the sharks say to each other again? Greet each other correctly and get rid of your cards as quickly as possible. The fishing hooks provide additional action, because everyone wants to grab the tasty worm - but not the dangerous electric eel!

—description from the publisher

name: Nenne drei: schon vorbei! ... für Harry Potter-Fans!
description:
Do you love Harry Potter and his magical world, have you devoured the books or successfully completed a movie marathon? Then this card game is made for you!
So you know your way around the wizarding world. But can you also name three matching terms for a category in just nine seconds, such as three ghosts, rooms in the castle or magic potions? Whoever answers correctly gets the card and whoever has the most cards at the end wins the game.

—description from the publisher

name: Nenne drei: schon vorbei! ... für New Adult-Fans!
description:
Do you love New Adult, have at least one Book Boyfriend or Book Girlfriend and your heart beats for good romance novels? Then this card game is made for you!
Whether it's popular tropes, bad boys or cities in which New Adult books are set - of course you know your way around. But can you name three terms in just nine seconds? That's the only way to win this fast-paced, romantic game and become the winner of hearts.

—description from the publisher

name: Nenne drei: schon vorbei! ... für Teens!
description:
Chocolate bars, places for first dates, influencers - can you name three matching terms for each category in just nine seconds? Are you quick, clever and creative? Whoever answers correctly gets the card and whoever has the most cards at the end wins the game. The rules are very simple and the fun can begin immediately. The categories are a colorful mix and range from pop culture and everyday knowledge to flora and fauna - there's something for every teenager!

—description from the publisher

name: Schneller als Pythagoras
description:
Can you calculate faster than Pythagoras? As soon as the dice are rolled, it's up to all of you! Who will prove to have a clever mind and be the first to correctly combine the cards on display to arrive at the result of the dice? But will the calculation really work? If not, the others will get valuable points. Who will win the next round? This card game for 2 to 6 people requires speed and a clever mind!

—description from the publisher

name: Würdest du lieber ...? Für Teens
description:
The exciting question game is now available for all teenagers - whether in pairs or in large groups - everyone can play! With over 60 cards, there are a variety of exciting questions - from challenging decisions to funny scenarios: Would you rather embarrass yourself in front of your crush or get a bad grade? Would you rather have unlimited battery life or endless mobile data for your cell phone? Would you rather be able to breathe underwater or fly? How do you decide? The practical card box in a handy take-away format is ideal for on the go, at home or as a fun party game.

—description from the publisher

There is a game variant with scoring to keep the game more exciting. The person who reads out the question first writes their answer face down on a piece of paper. Then everyone in the group has to write down an assessment of what the person reading out the question has chosen. Each person who was correct receives a point, and whoever has collected the most points at the end wins the game.

name: Aeon's End: The Abyss
description:
An expansion for Aeon’s End that consists of milestones from The Descent Gamefound campaign. It contains:

Treasures:
Doublefang Looking Glass
Flash Gauntlets
Infinity Bracer
Storm Orb
Bloodjelly
Cracked Fang
Thunderstrike Sygil
Ancient Scimitar
Bayli's Burning Aura
Kiri's Phoenix Claw
Auren's Rusted Automaton
Ona's Destroyed Geode
Dorian's Spatial Distortion
Banner of Vitality
Kavoc's Forgotten Ritual
Kavoc's Stonesoul
Kavoc's Dark Flame

Gems:
Spirit Jewel
Glutton's Jewel
Whisper of Amethyst
Pulsing Garnet

Spells:
Void Grasp
All-out Barrage
Unveil Potential

Relics:
Bottled Demon
Rebound Spike
Fate's Edge

Mage:
Xaxos, The Fledgeling

Friends & Foes:
Xoxos, The Arcane Researcher
Xaxos, The Traitor

Nemesis:
The Reliquary + 21 Nemesis Cards

Xaxos Turn-order Deck
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Science Fiction
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Variable Phase Order, Variable Player Powers

name: Zaubertränke
description:
Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of magic! Get ready to brew Felix Felicis, Polyjuice Potion and the Potion to Boost. To do this, throw the number cards into the matching potion cauldrons one after the other. But be careful, if the bubbling cauldron overflows, you will receive the cards as minus points - unless you have the most cards of that color at the end of the round. But beware, the green poison adds more minus points to the potions. So not only brewing skills are required here, but also tactics! Whoever has the fewest minus points at the end of the game becomes the potion master and wins the game.

—description from the publisher

name: Flip-Flop Monster
description:
Flip-Flop-Monster is a fun memo game with an exciting twist. Who will win the most monsters? Go in search of the complete groups of monsters - the number on the tiles tells you how big the group is. Turn the tiles over and discover the monsters on the backs. The aim is to collect monsters from a group. The number on the tiles indicates how many identical pictures make up a complete group. The aim is to collect as many tiles as possible and place them in front of you. But even these tiles are not safe at first, as other players can still steal them. Only the player with the most tiles in front of them at the end of the game wins.

—description from the publisher

name: Stadt, Land, ... Das inoffizielle Spiel für Potter-Fans: Extreme
description:
No matter where you are - with this exciting Town, Country, Potter fan edition, you'll always bring a big dose of fun to the table! You can test your Hogwarts knowledge and put your creativity to the test in 26 new categories. In the exciting Extreme game variant, your answers have to match two categories: “In the school of magic” and “Don't sink in the water” - who will be the quickest and get to shout “Stop!”?

With its cool design and exciting themes, this varied game block will win over every Potter fan, big or small. From simple questions to tricky categories - there's something here for everyone.

—description from the publisher

name: Stadt, Land, New Adult: Der Spieleklassiker für Fans von Enemies-to-Lovers bis Second Chance
description:
No matter where you are - with this exciting City, Country, New Adult block, you'll always have plenty of fun! You can test your knowledge in 52 categories and, above all, put your creativity to the test. The game block impresses with its beautiful design and exciting topics - perfect for all city, country and river fans. From simple questions to tricky categories - there's something for everyone here.

—description from the publisher

name: BACTERIUM!
description:
BACTERIUM! a thrilling 2-player card game where you take control of powerful bacteria, vying to shape the very essence of life itself!

Your planet is just born, and you have to evolve the bacteria under your control. Take part in the beginning of the life formation.

Harness the power of evolution as you strategically play through an array of bacteria challenges, mutations, and unexpected twists. Will you pave the way for your bacterial brethren to flourish, or will your opponent outmaneuver you, leaving your planet barren and desolate?

With easy-to-learn mechanics and endless strategic depth, Bacterium! promises thrilling gameplay for 10+ age players. Are you ready to embark on the ultimate microbial journey and claim victory as the architect of life itself? The fate of your planet awaits your command!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Print & Play

name: ティルナノグを探して (Tir Na Nog wo Sagashite)
description:
This is a game where you create magic by combining various materials and collect rainbow fragments to give to fairies so you can be invited to Tír na nÓg, the land of eternal youth.

In ティルナノグを探して (Searching for Tír na nÓg), magical material cards have three attributes: sky, sea, and earth. Each attribute can be one of three materials. You create magic using a set of three cards from your hand, with different combinations of matching attributes and materials scoring different points. Plus, when you create magic with your chosen attribute, you receive a nice bonus. Make good use of the different attributes of magic and collect rainbow fragments!

name: iykyk* Pop Culture Trivia
description:
iykyk Trivia: Pop Culture Edition features 150 Questions about celebs, reality TV, and social media. Get ready to turn your pointless knowledge into points and prizes.

—description from the publisher

name: Gearworks: Simone Promo Card
description:
A promo tinkerer card that can be used in place of the other black tinkerer (Wyatt). Available from a March 2024 Kickstarter campaign.

Ability: "Swap 2 gear cards in grid."
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Hand Management, Set Collection, Tile Placement, Variable Player Powers

name: Gearworks: Maxx Promo Card
description:
A promo tinkerer card that can be used in place of the other purple tinkerer (Victoria). Available from a March 2024 Kickstarter campaign.

Ability: "Play 2 gear cards instead of 1."
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Hand Management, Set Collection, Tile Placement, Variable Player Powers

name: SUBASTA
description:
SUBASTA is a game about auctions where a group of very rich people will get very weird and random items in crazy auctions.

The players will participate in different fast paced auctions with different bidding mechanics where they will get non-conventional items like a vegan zombie or a poop in a stick.

During the game, there's a random chance of getting income depending on the amount of items each players have (the more items, the better), and there are also some random events that will disrupt the game economy in crazy ways.

The first player to get 3 cards of the same color group or 3 cards of the same number group wins the game.

—description from the designer
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Humor, Party Game
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Betting and Bluffing, Dice Rolling, Events, Income, Memory

name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Adventurer Pack
description: An expansion for Nova Aatas Renaissance. This expansion add a side campaign consisting of 3 missions. It also contains 2 new Heroes, 2 new hunt missions, 6 new enemy types and new Equipment.
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Renaissance
mechanics: Action Points, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Modular Board, Role Playing, Storytelling, Team-Based Game, Turn Order: Time Track, Variable Player Powers

name: Fortune and Glory: Goggles Promo Card
description:
Promotional card 018 for Fortune and Glory: The Cliffhanger Game.

GEAR + CLOTHING + GLASSES

Adds +2 Adventure Dice during any Tech o Flying Test
Discard to prevent all wounds you would take from a single source.

name: Toc Chocottes
description:
Toc Chocottes is a game of memory and risk taking game.
Each card is a nightmare that players must get rid of.

At the beginning of each round, each player know 2 of their 4 facedown cards.

When any card is discarded, every player can get rid of the matching cards he/she remembers.

This game is based on traditional 'dutch/tamalou" game.

name: Rayman the board game
description: Discover Rayman like never before in an all-new board game adventure! Team up with your favorite heroes in an epic race, dodging dangers and saving the Teensies!

name: Arctic
description:
White, white, nothing but white. You scan the snowy expanse of the Arctic, hoping to catch a glimpse of the inhabitants that live there. The more animals of a type that you see together, the better — yet you also want to diversify your sightings, while moving your totem animal toward the pack ice as far as possible.

In Arctic, you move across the landscape and spot animals, creating a pile of animal cards in front of you. The card on top of your personal pile is your "visible" animal card. Each animal card contains four pieces of information:


A placement value
The main animal depicted on the card
A companion animal
A draw value


At the start of your turn, place as many cards from your hand into your personal pile as the placement value of your visible animal card. (On your first turn, place one animal from your starting hand of three cards.) For each card you can't place, draw a card facedown from the deck and place it in a personal penalty pile. Next, using your new visible animal card, move the token of the main animal forward one space on the landscape and the companion animal backward one space or vice versa. Finally, draw as many animal cards from the "river" of six animal cards as the draw value of your visible animal card. (If you now have more than seven cards in hand, discard into your penalty pile until you have seven.)

Each time you place an animal on your pile, take the matching animal power card from the center of play or whoever currently has it. You can use the listed power each turn for as long as you hold this card, such as moving an animal token an additional space, drawing from your penalty pile, or refilling the river after each card you draw.

When the deck runs out, you finish the round, then place cards one more time, then score points. For each type of animal, you score points based on the largest set of consecutive cards of this type you have in your pile. You score a bonus based on the number of sets you've completed. Reveal the animal token you received at the start of the game, and score based on how far it advanced across the landscape. Lose 1 point for each card in your penalty pile. Whoever has the highest score wins.
mechanics: Deck Construction, Hand Management, Set Collection, Turn Order: Progressive

name: Colt Express: Happy 10th Anniversary
description:
This box was designed to delight Colt Express fans! It brings original content and exclusive, high-quality game elements, such as wooden screen-printed pawns and tokens, as well as two new bandits to play with even more players.

It's the perfect box to give (or to treat yourself to) for all Colt Express fans!

But what's in this box?

THE CIRCUS CAR — Slide up and down the giraffe's neck to change floors, or search the clown's chests.
THE HANDCAR — Hide underneath the train and pop up wherever you like, or send your opponents flying to the roof of the train.
SCREEN-PRINTED LOOT TOKENS AND CHARACTER FIGURES — Replace your cardboard tokens with these beautiful, sturdy wooden ones.
TWO NEW BANDITS — Al Patron, The king of corruption & Mary Pumpinks, An automated Bandit that adds an adorable opponent to the game.
SPECIAL PUNCH CARDS — The bandit targeted by a special Punch card is not moved to an adjacent train car, but changes floors instead.


—description from the publisher
categories: American West, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Trains
mechanics: Action Queue, Hand Management, Memory, Programmed Movement, Take That, Turn Order: Progressive, Variable Player Powers

name: Avoid the Cats!
description:
Avoid the Cats! is a family trick taking/avoidance game where players play as rats trying to avoid the cats, who will chase players that goes for specific cheese. Will you be able to score points avoiding them? Or, even better, will you face them all for even more of points?

Using some simplified mechanics from Cheez-Tricks, players play trick-taking hands, following usual trick-taking rules (must follow, trump, etc). In each round, though, some cats should be avoided. For example, the player should not get the Parmesan 7.

Points are awarded according to cats avoided. After three rounds, the player with the most points is the winner.

—description from the designer

name: TTMC: Edition BTP
description:
TTMC: Tu te mets combien? BTP edition is a unique collaboration between the creators of TTMC and the collaborators of NGE.

Whether you're a master of reinforced concrete or barely know the difference between a Molly pin and a knock-in pin, TTMC: Edition BTP Edition offers a construction gaming experience you never imagined!

With improbable questions as well as certain answers, TTMC: Tu te mets combien? is here for you to become the construction ace.

—description from the publisher (translated)
mechanics: Questions and Answers, Race, Track Movement
publishers: Les Editions de base, Pixie Games

name: Sock Pile
description:
An asymmetrical, closed drafting, matching game to enjoy with 2-6 players. Players put down socks once per turn, activate sock effects, and make as many pairs as possible before the sock pile runs out!

Once the sock pile is gone, all players discard their hands, count points for successful pairs and subtract points for socks without pairs. Whoever has the most points after that, WIN!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Closed Drafting, Pattern Building, Take That

name: Sail or Die
description:
Sail or Die supplies you with 15 points and a full hand of cards. You want to keep the points and get rid of the cards.

On the one hand, shedding your cards is tough without bending the rules at least a little, and "cheating" happens to cost points. On the other hand, each card that you do not manage to play out in time will lose you a point anyway. If you strike the right balance over the course of three rounds, you win.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Hand Management, Ladder Climbing, Score-and-Reset Game

name: Todome Knights
description:
A horde of monsters appeared in a far-off kingdom. You lead a motley crew of adventures who will fight alongside other human knights, elven archers, and beastly warriors. However, only the one who deals the final blow to the monster will take home the monster's head as an achievement. Who among you shall achieve the most feats?

In Todome Knights, players have a hand of numbered Knights, Archers, and Beasts. A monster card with its own special abilities is revealed, and players each select a warrior card and simultaneously reveal them. The player who plays the lowest number attacks first, with the number causing that much damage to the demon. If players reveal equal numbers, they are resolved in the order of blue Knight, then yellow Archer, then red Beast (this order matches the color order of a Japanese traffic light). But be careful! Monsters have hidden strengths, making it difficult to predict which attack will claim victory! Sometimes you may even be defeated by the demons.

The player who administers the finishing blow to the monster takes that card as a trophy, which is worth 1 point. If you defeat a monster by hitting its weak point, the trophy is worth 2 points. After six monsters, the player with the most points wins.

user summary (adapted and translated from the publisher's description)

name: AT-43 Hero Box: Nina Zero & Babylon Zero
description: AT-43 Therian Hero expansion; Nina Zero is an officer and a hero for the Therian army. She comes on foot and aboard her combat strider Babylon Zero. As a soldier, Nina Zero can become the officer of any bane goliath unit. Aboard her armored fighting vehicle, she is a unit of her own. Overseer Nina Zero has her own routine, "Zero Fire," which allows her to benefit from sniper rule even when she moves. Her armored fighting vehicle is equipped with a pair of medium nucleus cannons 2.0, an tweaked version with increased rate of fire! On top of that, this exceptional overseer can recruit a Red Blok unit into her company.
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Player Elimination

name: AT-43 Unit Box: Therian  Wrath Golgoth
description:
The Wraith assault golgoth is a semi-autonomous combat system based on a medium assault frame. It combines solidity and multiple core system patterns to guarantee maximum survival span. Designed to be an extremely mobile command unit, the assault golgoth was designed to become above all else the overseers’ favorite vehicle on the battlefield. The dreaded medium sonic cannon is ideal against soldiers and the medium nucleus cannon works marvels against armored vehicles. This variety of equipment is the Wraith’s best asset. It guarantees the overseer will never experience any boredom during a battle.

—description form the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Line of Sight

name: F1 Roll & Race: World Circuits
description:
This expansion includes new maps and new cars to expand the F1 Roll & Race experience. You can now play the new maps individually or expand the championships by combining all the circuits.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Print & Play, Racing, Sports
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Race, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Parcel Panic: Where's Our Stuff?
description:
Parcel Panic – Where’s Our Stuff?
A Lost Cargo Deduction Game

A misguided courier has mischievously misdirected your packages to storage lockers in myriad countries around the world. Parcel Panic is a cooperative deduction game where everyone, but you, knows your parcel’s location and contents!

Each player has three secret cards they cannot see but must decode. Players simultaneously ask any of 80 predefined questions to narrow down the clues and eliminate incorrect guesses and assumptions.

Decipher each mystery while cooperatively working together to stop the courier from completing his devious trip around the world.

Both Cooperative & Competitive Modes!

Bonus: Solo Mode via online web app.

—description from the publisher

name: What Comes to Mind?
description:
What Comes to Mind? is a party game where players write down answers to prompts and try to match with as many other players as possible.

Each round, a card is drawn featuring five statements and a picture on the back. Players answer quickly with the first thing that comes to mind associated with each prompt, receiving two points for each prompts. After three rounds, the player who scored the most cumulative points wins.

name: Time Fenix
description:
Play as Fenix, a warrior sage, to protect a magitek world from an ancient threat with the help of a sentient AI.

Take on 47 missions spanning 16 areas of an underground futuristic research facility.

Manage power levels and resources as you navigate areas on laminated adventure sheets with a dry-erase pen.

Seek out resources and power boosts, carefully defeat enemies standing in your way to advance, and plan how to defeat floor bosses to reach the powerful Time Crystals.

Strategize when to perform mystical meditative actions to draw and play crucial resource cards from your Focus deck.

Learn as you play: Story sections reveal additional game elements, rules, and mechanics as you progress.

By growing your stats and gaining new Focus cards and abilities, you can replay areas in new ways to unlock additional powers and objectives.

Seek out hidden bonuses and unlock new powers. The game rewards more efficient play and clever meta-gaming strategy.

Do you have the wisdom and fortitude to descend to the Reactor Core and prevent imminent disaster?

—description from the designer
mechanics: Chaining, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Finale Ending, Legacy Game, Multiple Maps, Resource Queue, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Candy Land Bake-Off
description:
Object: Face off against the timer and your fellow bakers as you roll the dice to complete recipes, earn points, and win!

Each player has a set of four ingredient dice. Starting with the youngest player, start the timer and flip over a recipe card. A solo bake is completed by the current player, a bake-off is played by all, and overbaked ends the current players turn and allows the next player to finish their time before starting their time. Roll your dice to try to match all the dice on the bake card, rerolling any that don't match.

The game ends when all the recipe cards have been used. Players get 1 point for completed solo bake cards, 2 points for completed bake-off cards, and 0 points for overbaked cards. The player with the most points wins.
mechanics: Action Timer, Dice Rolling, Pattern Recognition

name: Hipsterology
description:
Release your inner hipster with this fun and un-ironic game. Grow the longest beard by traveling around the board on your fixed-gear bicycle and collecting karma. But not all karma is good karma: avoid the barbershop and those dreaded clippers. Grab your favorite local brew, bring your vintage film camera, and throw on your favorite vinyl while growing the best beard in this game. More than just ironic fun.

This is a roll-and-move game, where you move around the board, and collect beard and karma cards. The game ends when all beard cards are drawn and you win by having the longest beard and being declared the "King of the Hipsters".

name: Krimispiel: Rezept zum Sterben
description:
Two influencer couples who fight each other, an animal protection activist who offends, conflicts over a cosmetics company whose internal company information is exposed to the outside world, and of all people, a well-loved early retiree becomes the victim of a perfidious crime. Is it a mistake? Is there a threat of more disaster? Can you decipher the connections?

You are forming a special commission to investigate this criminal case. Can you solve the case before there are more victims? With the order you will receive the results of the investigation found so far on the case in an envelope.

It's best to have your special commission consist of 2-7 players to investigate together. The game can also be played solo.

You can be creative and use tools during the investigation. Research on the Internet may also be necessary to track down the perpetrator.

name: Nozoku Dice
description:
Players take on the roles of apprentice wizards who visit magical caves to obtain dice that generate magical power. When an apprentice wizard acquires dice scattered in a cave, the magical power flowing from the dice changes the number of dice he holds. The overflowing magical power also affects the apprentice magicians watching from nearby. Only one type of dice can be brought back from a cave. Which apprentice magician will obtain the most magic power?

In Nozoku Dice, you must pay attention to the sides of the dice, not just the top! Players are each assigned a color and start with that color's hand of cards and two of that color's dice. The rest of the dice go to the center of the table. Cards are played by taking a matching die of another player's color and placing it on the card. The one who played the card takes both the primary and secondary actions on the card, capable of affecting the two dice they started with or dice they gain throughout the game. When a die is placed on a card, other players may play cards that match the side of the played die that is facing them. This allows them to take the secondary action. Players don't take back up their cards until they completely run out—and receive a bonus—or are unable to take an action when required.

The game ends when all dice of any one color have been removed from the center. Players each choose a number from 1 to 6, and remove all the dice of that color from their acquired dice. Players calculate their magic power by totaling all the remaining dice. The player with the most dice receives a 2-point magic power bonus. The player with the most magic power at the end wins the game. The game also offers solo play.

—user summary (adapted and translated from the rules and publisher's description)
publishers: 金沢小立野ゲームズ（Kanazawa Kodachi Games）

name: Vermisst in Vorarlberg
description:
Welcome to your next investigation! Immerse yourself in the world of criminal investigation work to uncover a crime case using clues, clues, witness statements and internet research. The aim is to solve one or two tricky puzzles in order to expose the perpetrator.

Will you find out what really happened to Mary Amann and who the perpetrator is? Check all documents, find evidence and alibis and think outside the box if necessary.

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: First Burger
description:
First Burger is a sequel or remake of Final Burger, a trick-taking game released in 2016.

This time, you're making burgers in a fast-paced memory game. The chef player tells the other players or customers which ingredient cards they should flip. For example, "Tomato cheese chicken onion sandwich!" Orders are placed using tokens, so the customers won't forget.

Every time you turn over a card with a correct answer, you receive points and may face greater challenges. If you can guess what the card will be when you flip it over, you receive additional points. What's more, if you flip the last piece of the order, you get a burger completion bonus! But if everyone tries and fails, it will be the chef who flips the final card.

You can stack the round ingredient cards in a staggered manner to create a fun-looking hamburger!

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: Quatre Pètals
description:
FOUR PETALS
Divulgative card game to recognize medicinal plants and relate them to their therapeutic properties and their daily use, based on the information collected in the Plantipédia de Remeiers and Remeieres de Girona.

—description from the publisher







CUATRO PÉTALOS
Juego de cartas divulgativo para reconocer plantas medicinales y relacionarlas con sus propiedades terapéuticas y su uso cotidiano, a partir de la información recogida en la Plantipedia de curanderos y medicinales de Girona.







QUATRE PÈTALS
Joc de cartes divulgatiu per reconèixer plantes remeieres i relacionar-les amb les seves propietats terapèutiques i el seu ús quotidià, a partir de la informació recollida en la Plantipèdia de Remeiers i Remeieres de Girona.
categories: Card Game, Educational, Medical, Print & Play

name: Through Ice and Snow: Big Box
description:
Playing on a modular board players captain their own ship in a bid to document species, build vital shelters and map treacherous landscapes. Each voyage brings unique challenges for your crew to face.

Succeed and become immortalised. Fail…and be lost to the ice forever!

The Big Box is a crowdfunding exclusive available to everyone who pledges Captain's Pledge or above, instead of receiving a box for the expansion and another for the base game - you can choose the Big Box. This will take up less shelf space than going for two boxes.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Events, Map Addition, Solo / Solitaire Game, Worker Placement, Different Worker Types

name: Lunaris 45: Promo Cards Solo Campaign Mode & Scenarios
description:
“The year is 2023 and the world is buzzing with excitement as a groundbreaking new project is announced. A leading corporation in space exploration has unveiled its plans to build a lunar complex unlike any other. The name of this project is LUNARIS 45, and its goal is to create a fully operational lunar colony that will be run entirely by artificial Intelligence. In this variant you’re
on your own...”

Use the official solo rules to play with these cards.

These 12 promo cards will give the player 2 new modes to play Lunaris 45:

6 Solo Campaign Cards - Play 6 solo sessions interlinked, with different challenges.

6 Scenario Cards - Solo\Multiplayer scenarios that offer a different challenge for the players

—description from the publisher
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction
mechanics: Contracts, Dice Rolling, Re-rolling and Locking

name: Pick a Pen: Hackers
description: Pick a Pen: Hackers is the latest addition to the Pick a Pen line and challenges you to use your strategic thinking skills as you choose colored pencils and fill in numbers in your score sheet. Earn points in different ways and try to get the highest score to win the game!

name: Gods of Rome: Promo Cards New Solo Mode, Solo Campaign & Scenarios
description:
The gods are divided. Rome has lost its way. We must restore its glory! With the favor of the gods, we shall lead our people to become the chosen tribe that will bring unity and strength to the empire once again.

These promo cards come with a link to the new official solo mode and also 10 new cards that can be used in 2 ways:


Solo Campaign Mode - create a different path to glory, where you'll play 4 interlinked solo games, trying to achieve redemption.
Scenario mode - use a single card to create a different setting for the solo\multiplayer game.


—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action Drafting, Pieces as Map, Zone of Control

name: Fado Duetos e Desgarradas: Promo Cards Solo Campaign Mode
description:
“The Great Day of Fado” is coming.

There is no memory of such an event, thousands of tourists and fado lovers from all corners of the world are expected. Managers from all over the country are working on the organization of the event. From north to south of Portugal, one, two and even three shows are planned simultaneously. It will be days, nights and, sometimes, even early morning parties!
Failure is out of the question, and to organize the perfect show, it is necessary to choose the best artist, the right alignment, the perfect melody and the most appropriate of the scenarios. It is the ideal time for some managers, hitherto unknown, to show how much they are worth.

No one will miss and this is your moment to shine!

These promo cards will come with a link to the official solo rule book, and also 4 new cards.

Solo Campaign Mode - Using the official solo rules, play 4 solo sessions interlinked with different challenges.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Moesteiro: Promo Cards Solo Mode, Solo Campaign & Scenarios
description:
Towards the end of the XIV Century, King D. João I ordered the construction of one of the most elegant Portuguese monasteries, the Monastery of Santa Maria da Vitória. During the construction period numerous prestigious architects, master craftsmen, and apprentices came from all over Europe motivated by financial rewards, prestige, and, importantly, the pursuit of knowledge.

In Moesteiro, players are architects in charge of teams of workers and master artisans and they compete for the glory of becoming the most prolific and important architect of their time.

A pack of 25 promo cards that will come with a link to the official solo rules and that offer the player new ways to play the game:

10 Automa Solo Cards - Now you can play Moesteiro in solo mode
6 Solo Campaign Cards - Play several solo sessions interlinked with different challenges
9 Scenario Cards - 8 of them can be played multiplayer, 1 is exclusively solo.

—description from the designer
categories: City Building, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Medieval
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Player Powers, Worker Placement

name: Lusitania XXI: Promo Cards Solo Mode, Solo Campaign & Scenarios
description:
Dreadful news reaches Rome; in the most remote part of Iberia, Lusitania, a people ungoverned and unwilling to be, has defeated the Roman Empire in another battle. Julius Caesar, Roman Emperor, is furious, he’s had enough.
"Alea iacta est" - the die has been cast.

He calls in his three best commanders with a clear message: travel across the Empire recruiting and equipping the most fearless Legionaries and Barbaric Mercenaries. Then march 4 Roman Legions into Lusitania to crush the heroic resistance. Caesar will lead one of the four legions himself and provides abundant funding to ensure success.

These 17 promo cards will come with a link to the official solo rules and also brings some new modes to play:

7 Automa cards - now you can play in solo mode
5 Solo Campaign Cards - play 5 different solo sessions with different challenges
5 Scenario Cards - Play Solo\Multiplayer with different challenges

—description from the designer
categories: Ancient, Card Game, Civilization, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: SOKO Unvergessen: Fall 2 – Der Unbekannte
description:
With your help, Inspector Karl Klugmann was able to successfully solve his first crime case in 2004. Now a bigger challenge is waiting for him - an unknown dead man who has not yet been identified. Who is the man who was found in the Vienna cemetery of nameless people in 2018? What happened to him? And who is responsible for it? This challenge is too big to be able to master it alone – joins Inspector Klugmann's team and helps him to solve this case.

You get the scant investigation file and access to the web-based police portal and you can get started right away! An envelope filled with helpful artifacts is included for your progressive investigation.

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: Unsolved Crimes: Der Podcast-Mörder
description:
Mia Klein is a popular podcaster. With her channel "BloodCast" she wins the audience award in the highly competitive category "True Crime". But not everyone is happy with her success. When Mia is found murdered in Saalistaja, Finland, her fan base reacts shockedly. Rumors about the possible perpetrator are circulating quickly. An alarming number of people had a motive to murder Mia.

You take on the role of investigators to solve a crime with ingenuity, combination skills and detective work. Using a realistic case file, you have to uncover cross-connections, evaluate evidence and narrow the circle of suspects further and further.

Find a place with good lighting and internet access. Have pen and paper ready and an app for scanning QR codes and then open the main envelope. In addition to the first information, there are three other sealed envelopes. These remain closed at first and may only be opened if you receive instructions in the course of the game.

name: Cold Case Detectives: Fall #2 – Vermisst In Paris 1956
description:
CRIME TENSION FOR HOME - Solve an exciting crime case together and reveal the murderer!

REALISTIC EVIDENCE - Use over 40 credible documents and objects and work like real investigators.

CASE #2: It was 1967 in Paris. Actress Elizabeth West disappears from her hotel room under mysterious circumstances. Can you find out what happened to her?

GET STARTED IMMEDIATELY - Forget long instructions! You can start playing this crime game straight away. Perfect for anyone who loves an escape game or cooperative crime game!

2 - 3 HOURS OF HIGH VOLTAGE - Important: you need internet access. The story can only be played once, but the material is not destroyed and can therefore be given as a gift to friends.

name: Cold Case Detectives: Fall #3 – Der Fluch des Pharao 1923
description:
Solve a highly realistic interactive crime case together and find the murderer!

Use over 40 realistic documents and objects and work like real investigators to cooperatively find the murderer

Cold Case Detectives - Case #3: It's 1923 in the Valley of the Kings, Egypt. During excavations, archaeologist Sir John Williams is found dead in the burial chamber of Pharaoh Nebunenses II. Can you find out what happened to him?

Start straight away without lengthy instructions, perfect for escape game and crime game fans

1-4+ players, ages 14+, 2 - 3 hours of fun, Important: you need internet access, the story can only be played once, but the material is not destroyed and can therefore be given away to friends

name: Cold Case Detectives: Fall #4 – Tod am Filmset 1986
description:
CRIME TENSION FOR HOME - Solve an exciting crime case together and reveal the murderer!

REALISTIC EVIDENCE - Use over 40 credible documents and objects and work like real investigators.

CASE #4: It's spring 1986 in Hollywood when 23-year-old Brian Decker is found murdered while filming a horror film. Can you find out what happened to him?

GET STARTED IMMEDIATELY - Forget long instructions! You can start playing this crime game straight away. Perfect for anyone who loves an escape game or cooperative crime game!

1-4+ PLAYERS - The Cold Cases Detectives game is perfect for detectives ages 14 and up.

2 - 3 HOURS OF HIGH VOLTAGE - Important: you need internet access. The story can only be played once, but the material is not destroyed and can therefore be given as a gift to friends.

name: MonToons: Clash of the Coral Isles
description:
A prophecy was foretold of a celestial alignment called the Tidalmark where the moon, sun and tidal star would cast a beam of energy that would surround the Coral Isles, revealing a legendary artifact known as the Chief’s Crest. The leader of the clan that would gain control of this crest would claim its power, manipulate the tides and earn prosperity and balance for their clan.

MonToons: Clash of the Coral Isles is a fun, fast-paced competitive print-and-play game in which players will each control an asymmetric MonToon character sheet that they will assign dice to in order to move around the map and use special abilities to attack their rivals.

Each round, all players will simultaneously roll their 5 dice and assign them to various regions on their character sheet. You will move around the map, activate basic and special attacks to damage enemies or mark off spaces in the Leave Your Mark puzzle to win.

Your objective? To be the last leader standing or complete the Leave Your Mark puzzle on the Chief's Crest.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Paper-and-Pencil, Variable Player Powers

name: Le Vent Rouge
description:
The legendary thief Le Vent Rouge has challenged all scoundrels to rob the wealthiest man in France. Are you brave enough to enter his mansion, and skilled enough to escape with his treasures?

Le Vent Rouge is a dice roll & spend game for 2-4 players. In this game, you will compete, negotiate, and team up with other players to take on increasing risks in a heavily guarded mansion full of gold and objet d'art. At the end of the game, whichever player has the most points across all their stolen goods is the winner.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hidden Victory Points, Market, Negotiation, Push Your Luck, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Fist of the North Star x One Night Werewolf
description:
A collaboration product between “One Night Werewolf”, a very popular party game that allows you to play “Werewolf Game” with a small number of people in a short time, and “Fist of the North Star”! !
Play as the characters from “Fist of the North Star” and find out who is pretending to be “Jagi” or “Amiba” during the discussion!
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Deduction, Negotiation, Party Game
mechanics: Team-Based Game, Traitor Game, Variable Player Powers, Voting

name: Tai Ji Shi Fu
description:
Tai Chui is an internalised martial art from China. This game aspires to be the gateway to the concepts and values practiced in Tai Chi.
During the game, Chi Gong or training cards are drawn with different point values. They can be exchanged for Taolu or form cards of different types and/or for Chi or energy tokens. The first player to collect 5 different form cards and two different energy tokens wins the game.

name: ポミケ中止 (Pomike Chushi)
description:
You are a doujin author. As you live your daily life, you work hard at writing and drawing a new book for the doujinshi sale, commonly known as "Pomike." Writing can be a solitary task, but writers come together at the convention! However...I don't think there will ever be a convention. Even the new book you have written cannot be distributed without "Pomiket!" Who will draw the “Pomiket is canceled" card?

In ポミケ中止 (Pomiket is Canceled), players manage the resources of their busy lives as they write their own doujinshi. Writing is a solitary job, but sometimes we all work together on a joint magazine, go on a reporting trip together, undergo a tax audit, and gather at a sales event! At the sale, line up new books in your own space and exchange cards with each other saying, "I'd love to buy the new book, please!" and "Thank you very much!" At the post-even celebration, draft cards and interact with other circles to get material for your next work! But watch out, when the "Pomiket is canceled" card is drawn, the game ends. The player with the most victory points wins!

If you know even a little about doujinshi sales, you're sure to have a great time. Experience the real frustration of being chased by a deadline and live the joys and sorrows of doujin activities!

name: リトルアルケミア (Little Alchemia)
description:
This is Little Alchemia, a town full of apprentice alchemists. Learn alchemy and spread your fame by completing requests. When you gain enough fame, you will become a full-fledged alchemist. Who will be the first to graduate?

Players each become a different apprentice alchemist with their own special abilities. On your turn, you may gather materials, synthesize items, or fulfill a request. You may also go to the market to buy or sell materials and items. Gathering and synthesis actions involve rolling dice, so you'll need luck and planning on your side. Fulfilling a request gains you fame and money. The first alchemist to reach 30 points of fame is the winner!
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Variable Player Powers
publishers: Ever Forest Works (エバーフォレストワークス)

name: Strip Mall
description:
Step into the vibrant world of Strip Mall— where entrepreneurs turn a tiny storefront into a thriving empire.
It’s not just a game; it’s a crash course in hustle, creativity, and the sweet satisfaction of counting those virtual dollars!!

Great way for those who want to learn more about running a business. Learn the impact of advertising, rival businesses and random events which can make or break a fledgling business.

Take over three stores in the strip mall to expand your business empire and win.

—description from the publisher

name: マモノノ～まものの喚(よ)び方～ (Mamonono)
description:
The Demon King is worried. He promoted his most talented subjects to become the Four Heavenly Kings. However, the Four Heavenly Kings spend all their time arguing about who is the strongest, ignoring their duties. The Demon King was troubled, but he came up with a way to determine who is the best. “The one who grows the most powerful by nightfall will be recognized as the strongest of the Four Heavenly Kings!” And thus begins a chaotic battle of summoning battle.

In マモノノ～まものの喚(よ)び方～ (Mamonono: How to Summon Monsters), players take on the role of the Heavenly Kings and use Loyalty to bid on Magic Stones. If there is butting (multiple bids of the same amount), those bidders lose the Loyalty they bid but receive a Magic Stone as compensation. Magic Stones are used to pay the cost for summoning one of the available monsters. When all the monsters have been summoned, players exchange their leftover Loyalty and Magic Stones for Victory Points. Then players use their monsters to compete in a two-round Final Battle. The player with the most Victory Points after the Final Battle is the winner.

Can you use your monsters and their abilities to become the strongest of the Four Heavenly Kings?

—translated and adapted from rules and publisher's description
mechanics: Auction: Sealed Bid, Finale Ending, Open Drafting

name: LabRats
description:
In Lab Rats you control a group of researchers who must complete the different projects using the resources that you will acquire.
To achieve victory you must accumulate the maximum Research Points (PI), which you will obtain as you complete the Projects. The more difficult a project is, the more PI you will get, but the more resources it will cost to complete.
The main resources are glass cubes, which represent the material that can be found in a laboratory, and rats, which are used in some investigations.
The game time is measured in months, and each one begins with the Breeding Phase, where we will be provided with money and the rats will breed, followed by the Work Phase, in which the researchers are placed, and ending with the Maintenance Phase, in which everything will be prepared for the following month.
The main board has a calendar that marks the months, the locations where the actions are carried out and the project board.
The game ends when the year ends and that is when the finished projects must be presented. The winner will be the one with the most IP at the end of the game.

—description from the designer
categories: Animals, Economic, Educational, Industry / Manufacturing, Medical

name: Christmas Vacation: Memory Master
description: Played in teams. Players quickly memorize a hand of cards, then switch hands with their partners. Then each player chooses a card that he thinks will match one of his partner's cards.

name: モノクロエンドゲヱム (Monochrome Endgame)
description:
A black and white storm, in a certain house there were two rumors that were being whispered among young girls. One is "White Lily", an older sister who guides troubled girls to the right path. One is "Kuroyuri no Kimi", an older sister who invites troubled girls into a path of vice. In a season where hearts waves like petals on the surface of the water, will the fate of these girls be black or white?

Monochrome Endgame is a trick-taking game where you "must not follow", Each player is given a team. When playing with 4 players, the "white camp" and the "black camp" will compete with 2 players each. When playing with 5 players, one neutral faction will be added here. The player who wins the trick exchanges his winning cards with those of other players 2:1. By doing this, you can control the difference in the number of white and black cards of cards that a player with a specific position ultimately acquired and aim for victory for your side.
publishers: スタジオカヤノナカ (Studio Kaya no Naka)

name: Millennium Blades: Draw Power
description:
Once, long ago, in another timeline, there was a storage-expansion for Millennium Blades called "collusion". The hubris and luxury of that gratuitous box was so great that the druid kings declared it could never be reprinted again. Thus, we changed the name and reprinted it again in this normal-sized box. Maybe they won't find out.

Millennium Blades: Draw Power is an expansion for Millennium Blades that includes the main gameplay components from the Collusion expansion. This gives you access to Team Mode, NPC's, updated rules, new characters, and, of course, more cards!
mechanics: Commodity Speculation, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Real-Time, Set Collection, Simulation, Trading

name: Millennium Blades: Decked Out
description:
Is it unlucky that we released 13 mini-expansions for Millennium Blades over 8 years? That's a lot of games for one octade (which is like a decade, but shorter). While it would be worth it to use your valuable time travel opportunities to go back and collect all these, we decided to make things a little easier and just put them all in one expansion sized box.

Millennium Blades: Decked Out is an expansion for Millennium Blades that repackages and includes the items found in various mini-expansions. This includes rare Dice Tower promos, more characters, and more bosses.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Real-time
mechanics: Commodity Speculation, Cooperative Game, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Simulation, Trading

name: Mortes Estúpidas
description: Mortes Estúpidas ("Stupid Deaths") is a hilarious board game full of curious, clumsy, and surprising stories about the ways people have died. Every question card contains a Stupid Death, but is it true or false? Answer correctly and you will run away from the Death Pawn, but if you answer wrong the Death Pawn will approach. Be the last player on the board or collect all the letters of the word “MORTE” (death) and win the game.

name: Mimose & Sam et le Voleur de Fruits
description:
The fruits have been disappearing from the garden! Mimose, Sam, and their friend are trying to find out who or what is stealing them!

In this unique ONE VS ALL deduction game for kids and families 5+, players play detectives, gathering clues, eliminating suspects, trying to pinpoint the person who's been stealing all their beautiful fruits.
